dict.string: Thank you for downloading WhiteBoard. WhiteBoard is an app designed to help you get things done. It's very simple to use: Just enter whatever you want in the two text fields ("Boards") and click Save. The Boards will automatically be loaded upon opening the app! You can also customize WhiteBoard to your liking. Enter these settings and choose a theme, change the name of the Boards, or tap on the WhiteBoard logo in-app to set your own background. Enjoy using WhiteBoard!
